description: A television station located by the beach/shore in the Chopper Man universe. This TV station becomes the target of Dr. Usodabada's scheme to broadcast his demands and gain fame. The station employs anchors like Shopan and hosts events like the wrestling match between Chopper Man and Dr. Usodabada.

keyEvents.title: Wrestling Match at TV Station
keyEvents.description: The TV station hosts a wrestling match between Chopper Man and Dr. Usodabada, commentated by Shopan and Kazeno Minoru, which is broadcast to viewers.
keyEvents.significance: The TV station serves as the main location for the episode's conflict and provides the broadcast platform that makes the events public.

keyEvents.title: TV Station Taken Hostage
keyEvents.description: Dr. Usodabada uses blackmail tactics and takes over the TV station, holding the staff including Shopan hostage to broadcast his demands.
keyEvents.significance: Escalates the threat level and transforms the location from a neutral broadcasting venue to a site under villain control.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Man's Victory Broadcast
keyEvents.description: The TV station broadcasts Chopper Man's victory over Dr. Usodabada, helping him achieve celebrity status.
keyEvents.significance: The station's broadcast capabilities enable Chopper Man to gain fame and recognition for his heroic deeds.

statusHistory.reason: TV station is operational and broadcasting throughout the episode
